name: The Restaurant that Learns
description:
Every five seconds, this restaurant announces a new randomly-generated gourmet dish.

Optional Input: If the meal on offer strikes you as particularly delicious, click the word 'Yum'. Its flavours will occur more frequently in future offerings.  That's right: machine learning!!!  It's basically IBM's Chef Watson except utterly trivial and silly.

Created by H.H. Magoo for Dogpit's Input Optional jam on the 'Hits the Spot' theme with original music by Brother Kies
